title: Banned
body: So i whent to go and play some lol today only to find that i am now perm banned and i have no reason why now i know how the system works warning 3 day ban then 7 day then 14 day then riot review but i have never received a warning in my 3-4 yrs of playing lol neither have i ever been temp banned for 3/7 or 14 days does anyone know how i can try to get my account back i have sent a ticket but riot does not seem to be responding

replies.body: If you've been permabanned chances are it's for good reason and you wont be able to get your account back. Riot support staff should be able to tell you why you were banned but they're pretty strict on not letting people off if they've been perma'd.

They told me in a ticket reply that i was trying to sell my account but i wasnt i was in berlin for 3 months came back and my password had been changed so i changed it back logged in and my IGN had been changed so to my knowledge i was hacked and i got the account back when i reset the pw but they claim is was sold

Have you told that to support? I don't know how it works but ideally they would be able to check the change in IP when you stopped using it (which would be the person who gained control of it) and ask you some questions relating to before that change so you can prove that's the case. As I've said though, they're pretty strict on not removing permabans.
yes i have told them and am awaiting a reply
Hope they can help you then. Just don't be too surprised if they don't lift the ban, it's pretty much policy.
well the account was hacked so idc wat they say they account was and never has been for sale so they can fk policy cuz no rules were broken
